text: The Bowls England National Championships (Women's Singles Two Wood) is one of the events at the annual Bowls England National Championships. The Two Wood singles is a newer variation of the game, see - Glossary of bowls terms. ==Past Winners== {|class="sortable wikitable" |- !width="30"|Year !width="250"|Champion !width="110"|County
